Package org.ginsim.gui.service

Interface ServiceGUI

  • All Known Implementing Classes:
    AbstractServiceGUI, AvatarServiceGUI, BoolNetFormatServiceGUI, BoolsimFormatServiceGUI, CADPExportServiceGUI, CircuitServiceGUI, CNetFormatServiceGUI, CompositionServiceGUI, ConnectivityServiceGUI, DataViewerServiceGUI, DecisionAnalysisServiceGUI, DynamicAnalyserServiceGUI, FormatSupportServiceGUI, GINMLFormatServiceGUI, GNAFormatServiceGUI, GraphComparatorServiceGUI, GraphStructureExportServiceGUI, ImageExportServiceGUI, InteractionAnalysisServiceGUI, LayoutServiceGUI, LimitedSimulationServiceGUI, LocalGraphServiceGUI, LRGDocumentationServiceGUI, MaBoSSExportServiceGUI, ModelBooleanizerServiceGUI, ModelReversionServiceGUI, NuSMVExportServiceGUI, OmddVizServiceGUI, PathFindingServiceGUI, PetriNetExportServiceGUI, PolytopesVizServiceGUI, PRISMExportServiceGUI, ReductionServiceGUI, Reg2DynServiceGUI, RegGraphExportServiceGUI, RegulatoryFunctionTreeServiceGUI, RegulatoryGraphAnimationServiceGUI, SATExportServiceGUI, SBMLqualServiceGUI, SimpleServiceGUI, StableRegionsServiceGUI, StableStatesServiceGUI, StateInRegulatoryGraphServiceGUI, TrapSpaceServiceGUI, TruthTableFormatServiceGUI
    public interface ServiceGUI
    This interface is the central interface for GUIs for GINsim services. GUI services provide Actions depending on the type of graph. Each Service should declare the annotation "@MetaInfServices(GsGUIService.class)"
    Author:
    Lionel Spinelli, Aurelien Naldi, Duncan Berenguier

      Fields 
      Modifier and Type Field Description
      static int[] separators

      static int W_EXPORT_DOC
      Weight for menu export, images/doc

      Weight for menu Graph, action affecting the graphicalAttributes

      Weight for menu Graph, action affecting the selection
      static int W_TOOLKITS_MAIN
      Weight for menu Toolits, all
      static int W_TOOLS_MAIN
      Weight for menu Tools, action like simulation, stablestates...
      static int W_UNDER_DEVELOPMENT
      Extra weight for UNDER_DEVELOPMENT actions

    • Method Detail

      • getAvailableActions

        List<Action> getAvailableActions​(Graph<?,​?> graph)
        Give access to the list of the actions that the service provides for the given graph. These actions can be divided into four types: - Import : data import from file of various format. Represented by the ImportAction class - Export : data export to file of various format. Represented by the ExportAction class - Layout : Perform a graph layout. Represented by the LayoutAction class - Action : various data management algorithm. Represented by the GsMiscAction class
        Parameters:
        graph - the graph
        Returns:
        the list of actions provided by the service to the given graph type

      • getInitialWeight

        int getInitialWeight()
        Give a weight for the service, as defined by the developer.
        Returns:
        a positive weight or -1 if unsure

      • getWeight

        int getWeight()
        Give the real weight for the service.
        Returns:
        a positive weight or -1 if unsure

      • setWeight

        void setWeight​(int new_weight)
        define the new weight of the service
        Parameters:
        new_weight - the weight to set
